name: LoL-Iris
body:
![Iris Logo](http://imgur.com/qbqgwae)

# Iris - the LoL Communicator
## The radial-menu-driven, in-game-overlayed, contextual, Riot-API-enabled, completely customizable chat macro system
### Check your privleges, and I don't mean in the respository, shitlord, because this project was 100% trans-coded by a verifiable queer.

![RitoSaltworks Logo](http://i.imgur.com/7287T7V.png)

# A~~N~~ ~~AD~~VENTURE BY

![K pot Logo](http://i.imgur.com/qbqgwae.png)
